page.title: 05Education 2
page.content: 5PLAYGROUP For pre-school children meets Memorial Social Centre 3 mornings per week.Subscription per session.Holds annual Xmas party and outing.Self Financing. Close liaison with state school. 6SCHOOL OF DANCE.Meets 3 times weekly M.S.C.Up to 100 members preparing for coreographic competions county wide. 7UNITED REFORMED CHURCH.Sunday School meets every Sunday-30 members.Holds annual anniversary,sports,outing and party.Noted for excellent results in Sunday School Scripture Union exams. 8WOMENS INSTITUTE.Traditionally exists to promote womens'role in the country home through discussion,lectures,visits demonstrations and competitions.Meets monthly in own premises.Noted for craft contribution at Horticultural Show and teas it provides for the event.
